tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Wait time,
review: I consulted Dr Sindhu for tooth pain and sensation. She did a thorough examination before any conclusion/suggestion. Then suggested for an RCT in one of molar tooth and filling in the other. Treatment was comfortable and satisfactory. I have no further pain in the tooth even after a month of treatment.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Wait time,
review:
Dr Sindhu is extremely professional and friendly with a lot of experience in Root Canal Treatment but also everything else which is tooth related. 
She ensures the patient receives utmost care and doesn't rush into doing a job which could cause further complications in the near future. 

I have been her patient for over 5 years and have always received very good treatment.  Would strongly recommend Dr Sindhu for all your dental worries.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: I got my first Root canal treatment done from Dr Sindhu, usually Iam little scared and sensitive too . But the treatment was painless and perfect. She also gave a thorough explanation on how to manage my teeth better.I had a very good experience taking dental treatment at Rajesh cosmetic and implant dentistry. The place is very hygienic, very friendly and well maintained.Dr Sindhu ensured that the treatment was done without much pain and was very sensitive to my comfort.I would highly recommend all to visit Rajesh cosmetic and implant dentistry for all your dental problems
I got RCT treatment from Dr Sindhu , I'm extremely satisfied with the treatment thanks to Dr Sindhu and team , i recommend this clinic for any sort of dental treatment

I would tell this is the best dental clinic in JP Nagar.Got consulted by Dr.Sindhu she was excellent in her field of work.She explained everything clearly and it was a painless treatment..I would recommend this clinic for any dental issue.
Very progressions doctor inspires confidence in patient. Liked the fact that did not spend time on already submitted history.

Good.
Fine hands.
Good results in treatment and less pain.
Good explanation about the problem and the solution for it
Thank u so much doctor rajesh sir and doctor sindu madam for my root canal treatment.. initially I thought rct is very complicated.. but it is very simple procedure..Once again thank u..
